item.title: Life Lessons 101 - Memories
item.author: hello@forevergenin.com (Premkumar Subramanian)
item.description: I always wondered what leads to those lifelong friendships ? The answer seems to lie in memories. The foundation for any good friendship/relationship is built by memories shared between people. The memory can be a fun one or a boring one, but spending time and making that memory is vital. A boring memory is better than no memory at all. Those shared memories create the bond and more memories leads to a stronger bond.
